Player History
Drafted in 29th round, 450th overall pick, by Boston in 2015...
Was claimed off waivers by Houston on 4/12/2015.
Released by Houston on 4/27/2015...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 5/1/2015 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 5/7/2015, off John Whitlow (ATL)...
10/22/2015: Signed a contract extension with Philadelphia, $1,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
Hit first career homerun on 8/12/2016, off Oliver Encarnacion (DET)...
